Projects

Here are some projects we've incubated in the past. Pitch us an idea.

    Clubs

    Clubs at Yale

    A directory of extracurricular clubs for Yale students

    BDGate

    Bulldog Gate (offline)

    Shorten URLs so that only Yale students and staff can open them

    Makers@Y

    Makers at Yale

    A directory of programmers & designers at Yale

    PokéMap (incubated)

    Crowdsourced map for Pokemon Go

    Talks

The YCS is a student organization that promotes talks, workshops and study breaks related to computer science and engineering on Yale campus.

Join the Mailing List

Go to our Groups page at groups.google.com/a/elilists.yale.edu/forum/#!forum/ycs and click "Apply to join group". You must be logged in with your Yale account to access the website.

If you have trouble doing that, email felipe.pires@[y].edu and ask for help.
